page.title: 11OLDER HOUSES
page.content:
{ { { {My house is 274 years old and I have {lived in it for only four years but {four years is a long time to me {ayway.It has a conservatory and the {windows are casement windows.The {living room has brass window handles. {All the rest have metal window {handles. {In each room there are wooden beams. {The greenhouse used to be a {conservatory.There are three bedrooms {upstairs. The stairs have been {rebuilt. } It is called Lilac Cottage because there are lilac trees in the garden.It is a very big garden. We grow vegetables, flowers and fruit trees.
Joe Tuckwell
